summary: Angular 20 frontend comprehensive UI testing completed. All 15 requested features tested and verified working correctly. Landing page, auth flows (signup/login), parent dashboard, child management, navigation, dark mode, and all parent pages (Tasks, Wallet, Goals, SIP, Loans, Learning, Settings) render and function correctly.

backend_issues.note: NO BACKEND - Serverless app using Firebase Auth + Firestore directly from frontend

frontend: Landing page renders with hero section, features grid (6 features), CTA, and footer
Landing navigation has 'Kids Money' logo, 'Sign In' and 'Get Started' buttons
Landing hero has badge 'Financial Literacy for Kids', gradient text, and mockup dashboard
Features grid shows: Tasks & Rewards, Smart Goals, SIP Investing, Fun Stories, Credit Score, 10 Levels
CTA section 'Start your family's financial journey today' with 'Get Started Free' button
Signup page at /signup has Full Name, Email, Password fields and 'Create Account' button
Signup with Firebase Auth works - successfully creates account and redirects to /dashboard
Login page at /login has Parent/Kid tabs that switch correctly
Parent login form has Email and Password fields, 'Sign In' button
Kid login form has Parent's Email, Your Name, Your PIN fields, 'Let's Go!' button
Parent Dashboard at /dashboard shows 'Add Your First Child' empty state with 'Add Child' button
Add Child modal opens with all fields: Name, Age, Grade, Avatar (8 options), UI Theme (3 options), PIN, Starting Balance
Add Child modal has 3 UI themes: Adventure (Blue & Teal), Fantasy (Purple & Pink), Nature (Green & Blue)
Sidebar navigation works: Dashboard, Tasks, Wallet, Goals, Invest, Borrow, Learn, Settings, Log Out
Tasks page at /tasks renders with '+ New Task' button and empty state
Wallet page at /wallet renders correctly
Goals page at /goals renders with '+ New Goal' button
SIP/Invest page at /sip renders with '+ New SIP' button and empty state
Loans/Borrow page at /loans renders with '+ Request Loan' button and empty state
Learning page at /learning renders with financial stories ('The Magic of Saving', 'The Power of Interest')
Settings page at /settings shows profile info (name, email) and dark mode toggle
Dark mode toggle works correctly - adds/removes 'dark' class
Mobile menu button opens slide-out navigation with all items
Mobile bottom navigation has Dashboard, Tasks, Wallet, Learn, More tabs

critical_code_review_comments: Good use of data-testid attributes throughout all interactive elements
Code is well-structured with standalone Angular components and proper TypeScript typing
CSS design system is comprehensive with proper light/dark mode support
Navigation properly uses routerLink and routerLinkActive for Angular routing
Firebase integration uses proper async/await patterns with signal-based state management

test_credentials.note: Test accounts created during testing via Firebase Auth signup. Any email/password combo works for signup.

seed_data_creation: None - Firebase Auth handles user creation
context_for_next_testing_agent: Angular 20 + Firebase app fully functional. All parent-facing features tested: signup, login, dashboard, tasks, wallet, goals, SIP investments, loans, learning stories, settings. Dark mode works. Mobile navigation works. No issues found. Add Child modal has all required fields including avatar selection (8 colorful avatars) and UI theme selection (Adventure/Fantasy/Nature). Firebase Auth creates accounts successfully. Firestore may timeout if database not created in Firebase Console.
